hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: I'd like to send this to roidshop.ro Vanessa Vine from Frack Free Sussex, and who lives four miles from Balcombe, said: âIf the tiny minority of 60 anonymous Balcombe residents who've issued this astonishingly naive pro-fracking statement had taken the trouble to look at the true relentless propaganda on this issue - or to investigate the enormity of the risks posed both to their Outstanding Area of Natural Beauty and their personal health by unconventional fossil fuel exploitation - they might be less aerated about "grass verges" and "unsightly bannersâ.
